name: Pink Frog Interactive, Inc.
tag_list: interface-design, design-research, information-architecture, heuristic-evaluations, expert-reviews, wireframes, styleguides
overview:
We help make your product interface and navigation intuitive, easy to use and pleasurable to look at and interact with.

Pink Frog Interactive, Inc., specializes in interface design, information architecture and design research. We create user-friendly experiences using techniques and principles derived from cognitive science, psychology and anthropology to design and test interfaces in order to make them useful, usable and desirable.

We believe that providing a great user experience is an ongoing effort and that good design doesn’t happen by chance. Good design is well thought out and in the details of the design and interaction. We love combining technology and design and making complex things appear simple. A great user experience happens because it is part of the process.

More than a pretty face - user-friendly and a better bottom line. Our background in graphic / visual design coupled with our expertise in information design and human factors allow us to create interfaces that not only look pretty but are user friendly and a better bottom line.

Research shows user-centered design gives you a competitive advantage over the competition, increases sales, increases stock price, decreases training and customer support costs, helps maintain a consistent code base for ease in translation and, decreases or prevents the cost of rewriting code.
